Pong.js

This is pong in typescript. There is a crude AI implemented at the moment, which I will likely revise later. The right-side paddle is controlled with the up-arrow and down-arrow. Press spacebar to start the game. I did not reference any other projects or guides to get this far, although I may need a reference for the finer points of pong (e.g. angular trajectory from a moving paddle, an AI which offers a decent challenge instead of just following the ball perfectly, drawing the score using squares so it looks like it did on the old arcade cabinet, etc.).
